name: Progress Tracker
description: Track progress on any goal or project with visual progress bars, milestones, and check-in points. Perfect for long-term objectives.
author: Frame Team

fields.name: title
fields.label: Goal/Project Name
fields.placeholder: What are you tracking progress on?

fields.name: summary
fields.label: Description
fields.placeholder: Describe your goal and why it matters

fields.name: targetDate
fields.label: Target Date
fields.placeholder: When do you want to achieve this?

template:
---
title: "{title}"
summary: "{summary}"
tags: [{tags}]
contentType: tracker
progress: 0
status: in_progress
targetDate: {targetDate}
created: {date}
lastUpdated: {date}
---

## Milestones

### Phase 1: Foundation (0-25%)
- [ ] Milestone 1.1: Define success criteria
- [ ] Milestone 1.2: Gather resources
- [ ] Milestone 1.3: Create action plan

### Phase 2: Building (25-50%)
- [ ] Milestone 2.1: Complete first major task
- [ ] Milestone 2.2: Reach halfway point
- [ ] Milestone 2.3: Review and adjust

### Phase 3: Momentum (50-75%)
- [ ] Milestone 3.1: Overcome major obstacle
- [ ] Milestone 3.2: See visible results
- [ ] Milestone 3.3: Get feedback

### Phase 4: Completion (75-100%)
- [ ] Milestone 4.1: Final push
- [ ] Milestone 4.2: Quality check
- [ ] Milestone 4.3: ðŸŽ‰ Goal achieved!
